description: composite purchase order line with dereferenced/expanded orders fields

id.description: UUID identifying this purchase order line

cancellationRestriction.description: whether or not there are cancellation restrictions for this purchase order line

cancellationRestrictionNote.description: free-form notes related to cancellation restrictions

cost.description: cost details associated with this purchase order line

details.description: details about this purchase order line

fundDistribution.description: the UUIDs of the fund distribution records for this purchase order line

poLineNumber.description: A human readable number assigned to this PO line

purchaseOrderId.description: UUID of this parent purchase order

vendorDetail.description: details related to the vendor of this purchase order line
